mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EXPERIENCE WHERE EXP_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT EXP_NO, EXP_TITLE, EXP_WRITER, EXP_PEOPLE, EXP_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(EXP_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(EXP_WORK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(EXP_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), EXP_STATUS, EXP_COUNT, TO_CHAR(EXP_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), EXP_AREA, EXP_ADDRESS, EXP_CATEGORY_NO, EXP_CATEGORY_NAME, EXP_WORK_TIME FROM TB_EXPERIENCE JOIN TB_EXPERIENCE_CATEGORY USING (EXP_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE EXP_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY EXP_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_EXPERIENCE SET EXP_COUNT = EXP_COUNT + 1 WHERE EXP_NO = #{ expNo } AND EXP_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT EXP_NO, EXP_TITLE, EXP_WRITER, EXP_PEOPLE, EXP_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(EXP_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(EXP_WORK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(EXP_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), EXP_STATUS, EXP_COUNT, TO_CHAR(EXP_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), EXP_AREA, EXP_ADDRESS, EXP_CATEGORY_NO, EXP_CATEGORY_NAME, EXP_WORK_TIME FROM TB_EXPERIENCE JOIN TB_EXPERIENCE_CATEGORY USING (EXP_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE EXP_NO = #{ expNo }
